name: Supply Run (Fergus Doyle)
description:
You are the assistant engineer in a company of Freelance Mech Pilots, and you have been given a very important mission - to get out of the chief engineer's hair for a while and pick up the supplies. Explore Starkad Station, chat with the local business owners and change the future of the company completely!

This is a piece of interactive fiction written in Twine.
